title: Font, or something similar, used on this Milano street sign
content:
Hello,

I came across this street sign in Milano and was wondering what font, or something along the lines, is used.

Thanks in advance

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419225541im_/http:/typophile.com/files/milan-design-week-2014-10-designers-and-events-you-cant-miss-1-tortona_5419.jpg)
author: A-type

comments.content:
Some similar fonts:  
ITC Bauhaus [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/bauhaus/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419225541/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/bauhaus/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/bauhaus/")  
Chalet London 1970 [http://www.houseind.com/fonts/chalet](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419225541/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/chalet "http://www.houseind.com/fonts/chalet")  
Pump Light [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/pump/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419225541/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/pump/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/pump/")  
Blippo [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/blippo/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419225541/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/blippo/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/blippo/")  
ITC Ronada [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/ronda/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419225541/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/ronda/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/ronda/")  
Don
Thank you for the suggestions Don. Those were alot of help.

Some more typefaces that could be used to recreate the look:  
 [http://usfonts.gestalten.com/logasmen.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419225541/http:/usfonts.gestalten.com/logasmen.html "http://usfonts.gestalten.com/logasmen.html")  
 [http://usfonts.gestalten.com/mini.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419225541/http:/usfonts.gestalten.com/mini.html "http://usfonts.gestalten.com/mini.html")  
 [http://dharmatype.com/post/84493005362/all-round-gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419225541/http:/dharmatype.com/post/84493005362/all-round-gothic "http://dharmatype.com/post/84493005362/all-round-gothic")
